Pokemo Ultra Sun and Moon

Game version 1.1

//60FPS
D3000000 33000000
20F67FE9 00000000
D2000000 00000000

//30FPS
D3000000 33000000
20F67FE9 00000001
D2000000 00000000

//60FPS (Hold R for 30FPS)
//The game will run faster
D3000000 33000000
20F67FE9 00000000
DD000000 00000100
20F67FE9 00000001
D0000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

//The game will run faster

D0000000 00000000
